title: Does anyone have had the same issue as mine?
body:
The game keep refusing to load me into the match. Yet I'm all fine on selecting game modes and champ selection and stuffs. (From the pics, you can also see that my game status was "in Game").
This issue happens more and more frequent after the latest update. 

I've triple checked with my internet provider as well as the activity log, everything seems fine but I just can't get into the game. Wondering what's happening with riot now.

P.S. Is that also why there're  more afks these days?

replies.body: If you can't ever get passed the loading screen, there's a good chance you're getting blocked by something like firewalls or antivirus. Be sure to [**check your firewalls**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3) to be sure they aren't blocking League for some reason, and let me know if that doesn't help.

No. It's not working, even I had add LOL into white list and disabled my firewall. Issue remains.

P.S. My operating system is MACOS High Sierra.
